items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
9% increased Attack Speed
+69 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 23 to 434 added Lightning Damage
Supported Skills deal 6% increased Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: A single facet contains the wisdom
of countless disintegrated worlds.

items.name: String of Servitude
explicitMods: Implicit Modifier magnitudes are tripled
flavourText: For the Vaal, the relationship between slave and master
was as intimate and volatile as that of lovers.

items.typeLine: Masochist's Jade Flask of the Abalone
explicitMods: Gain 2 Charges when you are Hit by an Enemy
45% increased Armour during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Perandus Signet
explicitMods: +30 to maximum Mana
52% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
2% increased Experience gain
2% increased Intelligence for each Unique Item Equipped
3% chance for Slain monsters to drop an additional Scroll of Wisdom
flavourText: "Our warehouses are bursting. Our vaults are full.
But our minds are still hungry."
- Medici Perandus, Prefect to the Treasury

items.typeLine: Alarmed Divine Life Flask of Assuaging
explicitMods:
Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 15 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 15 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
fracturedMods: Instant Recovery when on Low Life
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
